creator: jan.tosovsky.cz@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26696
Testcase

Create path and place text on it close to its begin/end with the text-anchor attribute set to 'middle' and startOffset outside the range 0-100%.
Current result: Text is not centered according to its specified startOffset value.
Expected results: Text is rendered correctly (like Firefox 4 beta, Opera).
A testcase is attached.
